videos.description: 1H (6:41) GONZ Zach Collins made Dunk. Assisted by Nigel Williams-Goss.
videos.headline: Great ball movement leads to a Zach Collins dunk for Gonzaga
Kadeem Allen with a steal on the defensive end than goes the length of the court for a lay-in plus the foul
Przemek Karnowski with 8 points so far in the 1st half
Lauri Markkanen with a strong drive and finish plus the foul

videos.description: 2H (6:48) GONZ Zach Collins made Layup. Assisted by Nigel Williams-Goss.
videos.headline: A great pass from Nigel Williams-Goss sets up Zach Collins for the score plus the foul
Nigel Williams-Goss with a huge lay-up late in the game

videos.description: Przemek Karnowski awarded the Basketball Hall of Fame's Hoophall LA MVP Award
videos.headline: Przemek Karnowski awarded the Basketball Hall of Fame's Hoophall LA MVP Award
